companyName: Aberdeen Standard Physical Precious Metals Basket Shares
description:
The investment objective of the Trust is for the Shares to reflect the performance of the price of physical gold, silver, platinum and palladium in the proportions held by the Trust, less the expenses of the Trust’s operations. 
 The Shares are designed for investors who want a cost-effective and convenient way to invest in a basket of Bullion with minimal credit risk.
